channel.title: SensationX | 24/7 VPS hosted | Webclient | Great Eco | Epic PvP & PvM | & More!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/3196393.gif[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N4y3Y1b-FSc
like and comment :)
[IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/3196401.gif[/img] - [SIZE=4][url=http://sensationx.weebly.com/] [url=http://sensationx.weebly.com/]SensationX [/url][/SIZE]
[U]Information:
[FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]Greetings!
We are a new server called SensationX.
SensationX is hosted on a 24/7 VPS.
We are constantly updating the server with new and better features, and hope to get in the top #10 servers eventually.
And the best of all, its all free!
You don't need to pay to play or to gain the best items in-game!
You ask why? We want that our players get the most fun out of SensationX.
Hope to see you In-Game soon!
-SensationX Crew.[/FONT]
- [url=http://sensationx.weebly.com/]SensationX [/url]
Features:
[CODE] - Friendly Staff.
- 24/7.
- VPS hosted.
- You can gain the [Helper] title for your effort and much more.
- Great XP Rate.
- Very active Staff.
- Cool PvP with all working weapons specials, curses and magic books.
- Easy Shopping (Never seen before).
- NOT LIKE ANY OTHER 718 SERVER!
- Double XP weekends.
- GanjaScape RAID BOSS.
- QBD & KBD.
- 100% Aura's.
- All skills trainable.
- 100% SoF.
- You dont need to donate to gain good items.
- Alot of Shops.
- Great ECO.
- No lagg.
- Perfect combat.
- No custom items.
- Great PvP & PvM.
- All Godwars bosses work 100%
- 100% Nex.
- Many minigames.
- Alot of training spots.
- 100% Overloads.
- All specs 100%
- Unique home.
- Crucible also fully working!
- Full Summoning.
- Fully working Fight Caves (All 63 waves).
- Fully working Fight Kiln.
- Tormented Demons.
- 100% nomad.
- Donator zone
- Bork
- Alot of teleports
- Many things to do, you wont get bored.
- Custom Dungeoneering.
- Great PvP
- Working Overloads
- Dungeoneering gear & weapons for tokens.
- And much much more[/U]Join now at: www.sensationx.weebly.com[/COLOR][/CODE]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/mn19jb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2nqt7a8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/vrer1j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/6ed9xj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2zf0ef5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2s7sugp.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: SensationX | 24/7 VPS hosted | Webclient | Great Eco | Epic PvP & PvM | & More!
item.dc:creator: @manuelq manuelq
item.description:
@manuelq wrote:

hey,

the site is a free site till we can afford having a better one.

and if u see a few pictures, that wont mean that we got features every 718 server has! (check it out yourself)

Read full topic

item.title: SensationX | 24/7 VPS hosted | Webclient | Great Eco | Epic PvP & PvM | & More!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Please, just please get rid of the horrid free webs website, get a free shared host and install smf onto it. You will be able to customize that far beyond your current choice. As for the rest, please don’t use a code box for a list of features, you can list features and use the bullets button! Your link to the free web site needs to be fixed since you can see the url tag. The pictures don’t look bad, but it would be great to see other features then mostly PvM, you have a couple of other skills, but it would be great to see maybe the home area, mini games, heck even the wilderness would be a great picture!

Read full topic

besides that I like the overall media I saw. Good to see 718 is actually improved.

item.title: SensationX | 24/7 VPS hosted | Webclient | Great Eco | Epic PvP & PvM | & More!
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Why do you have two different websites for one server? Get an actual web host and site that way you can put everything on one host and domain. Plus, you won’t need to use DropBox for your client/webclient.

Read full topic

[quote=“manuelq, post:3, topic:522581”]we have updated alot of thing lately such as :polypore dungeon : new donator areas :construction! and way more.
also we changed our server name
check us out today

hope to see u in game;)[/quote]
Changing the server’s name isn’t really anything. the only thing i see here that some 718’s don’t have is construction, otherwise looks like any other 718
Gl with this <3
